name: The Case of the Missing Crown
name_original: The Case of the Missing Crown
description:
This game is best suited for people new to video games, be it a child 5-7 years old, or someone who decided now's a good time to try these darned things out!

One of my best friends has a daughter who is just starting to get into video games, namely Super Mario Brothers.  I wanted to create something she could play without getting frustrated with, and since I'm making it from scratch, why not include her as the main character?    Hope you enjoy this short (and hopefully sweet) experience.

The art assets were obtained through the Unity Asset Store:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349 (thanks to Ansimuz)
